Reviews.Title: “good location, simple, efficient”
Reviews.Author: elaela2000
Reviews.Content: Before the trip to Istanbul, i wrote all these reviews and i knew it wont be a luxury/very comfortable place. It's true it's noice,...it's true they have small rooms, but the location is great- near to all the touristic atractions and also to the train, breakfast is tasty and enough, reception staff is friendly and always capable to give you a good tip. They change towel and get clean every day. In our opinion, is a good place for someone who's interested first to the city.

Reviews.Title: “The worst experience, I have ever had with hotels”
Reviews.Author: Nino D
Reviews.Content: I was alone and they gave me a hotel room, smallest as anyone can imagine and the window was looking into some whole with no air source and no air conditioning in it, No minibar was functioning. They told me there was no other room and they would change next day. Location is on Laleli, which is the main street for wholesalers street and many Russians with lots of bought goods where in the hotel and they are quite noisy. Restaurant was providing same oily food every day. Next day room was too far from wireless connection, so i had to sit on a floor next to door to catch very slow signal. It's too noisy street if you prefer open windows. But the views from the room is real Istanbul! Staff is not supportive at all and they have some water supply problems also.

Reviews.Title: “Noise”
Reviews.Author: wolfgangschepers
Reviews.Content: I staid there for 4 nights. I could not sleep very well because I've been in the 6th floor. Above my room there is the restaurant and you can hear moving the chairs up to midnight and again at 6 in the mornning. The room is very poor. I looked from my window at the emeregency staircase and there was mauch noise from the street. The personal at the reception desk is not well informed for example about the tram. No more information about the hotel and the city in the room! The mini bar was not in function. I cannot recommend

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable hotel as long as you want to enjoy the city”
Reviews.Author: AmirAbdelGhany
Reviews.Content: I was just using the hotel for breakfast and sleeping at the end of the day. Acceptable if you are going to spend most of the day outside as the rooms are somehow small. Reception in the morning shift are very helpful

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Place”
Reviews.Author: Pharohtemo
Reviews.Content: i enjoyed being there since i arrived, people are so nice and cooperative, they always help when they can, rooms are clean, well equiped and if u are missing somthin just ask and u will find it immediatly, the reception guy always helped me in roads and locating places on the map, he also arranged a birthday cake for my GF and made us a small party :) i recommend it strongly.

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Observer1972
Reviews.Content: Hotel is very cool, its unique, excellent services, has a view of the sea can see through breakfast, and the surrounding area is beautiful, near the tram, equipped with a bathroom and is available by everything, the rooms a little small but reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “simply the best”
Reviews.Author: nhez
Reviews.Content: location is very good.. hotel staff/front office are very helpful and they made me feel very welcome. being a solo traveler, they have helped me so much how to go here and there-out and about istanbul and they have also helped me arranged an appointment for my turkish bath. though the breakfast is not so okay coz they serve same menus for 3 straight days..but good enough.. first they gave me a room without a view..but i requested for a different room and which after they gave me what i wanted.. i arrived at 8am at the hotel and they have let me checked in as well right there and then..will definitely recommend this hotel to others..

Reviews.Title: “Exellent hotel and service”
Reviews.Author: ettte
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at this hotel for 4 nights.It was wonderful. The hotel and the rooms were very clean and the towels and the sheets were changed every day. The staff helped us for everything that we need. They are so friendly and polite.They solved every problem we have for the days we stay there. The food was very good and for a good value of money. The restaurant has nice views. The hotel is near to a lot of places such as, Grand baazar, Haga sophia mosque, Spice Bazar, and a lot of shopping centers. I Would recommend this hotel to all.

HotelInfo.Name: Martinenz Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Koska Caddesi 6 / 1 | Laleli, Istanbul 34130, Turkey
